messages.content: ComfyUI-RAFT is a custom node or extension for ComfyUI that generates optical flow using the RAFT algorithm.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-RAFT?
The purpose of ComfyUI-RAFT is to generate optical flow for images and videos in ComfyUI.
RAFT is an optical flow algorithm developed by the Princeton Vision Group. It is used in ComfyUI-RAFT for generating optical flow.
What is the basic workflow of ComfyUI-RAFT?

The basic workflow of ComfyUI-RAFT involves generating optical flow using the RAFT algorithm. The workflow can be visualized in the provided image 'wf.png' and the corresponding JSON file 'workflow.json'.
How can MotionBrush be saved to disk using ComfyUI-RAFT?
MotionBrush can be saved to disk using ComfyUI-RAFT by following the workflow illustrated in the image 'wf_savemotionbrush.png' and the corresponding JSON file 'workflow_savemotionbrush.json'.
Where can the source code for ComfyUI-RAFT be found?
The source code for ComfyUI-RAFT can be found in the GitHub repository at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-RAFT.
